Articles.Content:
So I know from the docs that the method:

double Part.RequestResource(string name, double amtDemanded)

will return the amount of resources actually available.  But, what if I'm refilling tanks, using a negative number?  What value is returned?

Will it be the amount actually put back into the tanks?  or the amount which there wasn't room for? or something else?

Thanks

Edited February 16, 2017 by linuxgurugamer
Yes, negative number works exactly like the positive one. It will give you the actual number it put in.
